topic.title: Dr. Tony Martin - The Jewish Onslaught
topic.body:
Dr. Tony Martin's seminal work The Jewish Onslaught is crucial in understanding the true role of Jewish People in American Slavery.

https://infogalactic.com/info/Tony_Martin_(professor%29

Video:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/data/users/19N49krDPpRvUbPMuHmxJVAXgKXPLQP32w/Dr%20Tony%20MartinThe%20Jewish%20Onslaught.mp4

Same Talk but better quality:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/data/users/19N49krDPpRvUbPMuHmxJVAXgKXPLQP32w/Dr.%20Tony%20Martin%201%20-%20The%20Jewish%20Onslaught%20(1993).mp4

Alternative Forum talk by Dr. Tony Martin in November 8 2000:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/data/users/19N49krDPpRvUbPMuHmxJVAXgKXPLQP32w/Dr%20Tony%20Martin%20on%20his%20book%20The%20Jewish%20Onslaught360.mp4

Dr. Tony Martin - Institute for Historical Review Talk June 2002:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/data/users/19N49krDPpRvUbPMuHmxJVAXgKXPLQP32w/Dr.%20Tony%20Martin%20Jewish%20Involvement%20in%20the%20Slave%20Trade%20-%20Institute%20for%20Historical%20Review%20Talk.mp4

The Jewish Onslaught: Despatches from the Wellesley Battlefront, Dover, MA: The Majority Press, 1993 (ISBN 978-0912469300).

Book:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/data/users/19N49krDPpRvUbPMuHmxJVAXgKXPLQP32w/Tony%20Martin%20-%20The%20Jewish%20Onslaught_%20Dispatches%20from%20the%20Wellesley%20Battlefront-The%20Majority%20Press%20(1993).pdf.zip

topic.title: ZeroUp needs a mute or block function
topic.body: ZeroUp doesn't have a mute or block function it seems. It would be very convenient if it had filtering so we could self-curate posts.

topic.title: Reaction emojis on posts and comments on ZeroTalk similar to Discord.
Best 3D Zeronet Zite so far. Check this out:

1577903734_1GGwcwi7tW4RZaAfG3xPR4JpoNE4A.body: Interesting. Check out Dr Tony Martin.

1578341356_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body: Porn is degenerate, but you cannot be censorship free if you ban. It is the entire point of decentralisation. Just block and mute the users that post porn.

> [styromaniac](#comment_1595_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): That's more like whack-a-mole than a simple solution.

That's the inherent point of decentralisation.

ZeroUp doesn't have a mute or block function it seems.
Open a ticket on the git:
https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroUp/issues

In the meantime just create a blocklist of the hashes that post porn:
The Zerowiki has a section on it:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/138R53t3ZW7KDfSfxVpWUsMXgwUnsDNXLP/?Page:blocklists

> [styromaniac](#comment_1596_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Any sentence that starts with "Just" assumes ease instead of difficulty. [...]

Just Clone and make your own ZeroUp where you remove all the porn and whatever you don't like. Decentralisation has no call to authority.

A good way to do this would be a NSFW switch that is off by default. If you don't want to see it, flip the switch. Any post that isn't properly labelled or wrongly labelled or spam gets assigned NSFW parameter automatically.

> [styromaniac](#comment_1597_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): those


That burden is on you. Not on any authority. We are decentralised here. There is no way to make a call to authority. No one is under any obligation to moderate any content. That burden is entirely on you.

> [styromaniac](#comment_1599_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): No it's not.
Curation and moderation is always censorship. If you are not willing to accept that burden then go back to the normal internet where everything is moderated including your free-speech. 

I see it as far more acceptable to say what I want without censorship and moderate what I see myself than having that done in a top down method, wiping my opinion with it. Stay rather and help us figure this out in a censorship free way.

> [styromaniac](#comment_1600_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): "Aww, yeah. I love that hot young pussy" is not speech of any importance.

I don't want to see that either. But who gets to decide who sees what? I trust no one with moderation but myself. No one should be able to decide what you want to see but yourself.

> [styromaniac](#comment_1602_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): By the way, Kopy Kate still has the Christ Church shooting video posted multiple times despite the admin saying that they would delete it for their own legal safety.


That burden is not on them. You're making another call to authority again. Stop trying to tame the Wild West. You cannot have the free if you do not take the wild with it.

> [filips](#comment_399_1LFu1BTScmY82HHtg3TY2jAuSrCYNsQWEY): It would be good to have more levels than just "NSFW" and "OK". For example, some spammy/shitty content might still need to be labelled as "not so OK" content, but it is definitely not so bad as CP or malware. [...]


Who is going to sit and moderate everything? I don't want admins deciding what I can see. Self curation/moderation filtering is the only way. We could share these filters with each other, but the option should always lie with us.

> [draugrdeathlord](#comment_241_12BRJSQrTETJVZzt2jHdqPywv3SdugSywC): Free speech doesn't mean we must allow porn in the middle of town square. [...]

While porn in the town square is degenerate, the act of "allowing or not allowing nudity" is a centralised authority making that decision. Zeronet is decentralized. The solution to your problem lies with easier to use filtering controls so you can decide at your own disgression.

No rules at all, ever. Decentralization means no moderation or censorship. Even of the things you don't like. If you're not happy with that, go back to reddit where you can do the opposite of what we do here. No one is a mod here. There is no authority. I hope you see only porn until you grow a spine and learn to filter what you look at yourself instead of asking others to do it like a dumb boomer in front of a TV.

Fucking jannisaries is what you are.

> [filips](#comment_402_1LFu1BTScmY82HHtg3TY2jAuSrCYNsQWEY): And then some new user come to ZeroNet. And what's first thing they see? Spam, porn, shitty "kill yourself" and "fuck niggers" posts, maybe even some malware or CP. Of course they will then continue using it...

Just like reality. Go to reddit if you want a nice clean and censored forum.

> [quantumkitty](#comment_367_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEaQbNZu): Not true. If I run out of data space I have to ask NoFish to raise my limit here on ZeroTalk.. it's his zite. I can always start my own, but then I won't have as many people to talk to ... so....

Not true. Nofish wrote the code. The decentralised nature of Zeronet has no authority or moderator. I could clone this zite right now and he would be powerless. The entire point of decentralization is not to have an authority. All authority is corrupted eventually. Why do you want to turn this into the the censored centralized internet?

Look what happened to steemit. Learn that lesson. They censored posts and everyone abandoned the platform.

> [filips](#comment_403_1LFu1BTScmY82HHtg3TY2jAuSrCYNsQWEY): Or you can create your own ZeroNet forum where you will allow all those shitty things.


Or you could create your own zeronet forum where you can not see those shitty things.

> [filips](#comment_402_1LFu1BTScmY82HHtg3TY2jAuSrCYNsQWEY): And then some new user come to ZeroNet. And what's first thing they see? Spam, porn, shitty "kill yourself" and "fuck niggers" posts, maybe even some malware or CP. Of course they will then continue using it...

Just because people are not allowed to say something, does not mean they don't think it. Just because you prevent people from saying something with rules and censorship does not stop them from thinking it. Reality is messy, dirty and ugly. If you want to clean that up, you have to censor people. Which is what the normal centralised internet has become. If you want to speak your mind you have to take the good with the bad. The minute Zeronet becomes censored, the additional burden of decentralisation becomes irrelevant and we might as well go back to a centralised structure. 

ie. any censorship or moderation instantly makes Zeronet irrelevant.

> [filips](#comment_404_1LFu1BTScmY82HHtg3TY2jAuSrCYNsQWEY): 10


Methinks you're just upset that you cannot censor anything here. 

hahahaha

https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/913/758/a12.jpg

> [styromaniac](#comment_1625_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): /*Keep complaining about people taking personal responsibility over their sites*/ [...]

"They're posting things I don't like, please someone cover my eyes so I can't stop gawking, I cannot possibly do it myself"

> [styromaniac](#comment_1626_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): We know you love CP, but there's no excuse to be a moron.

Go self copulate yourself, jannisary.

You're as degenerate as the content of your slander. Why are you projecting your interests onto others?

> [draugrdeathlord](#comment_267_12BRJSQrTETJVZzt2jHdqPywv3SdugSywC): Is defending CP a hill you want to die on ?

Why is it that when jannisaries cannot censor they seethe so much.

Cope and seethe jannie. You are powerless here.

> [duck0](#comment_183_17bfQv5PQW9FZ4akChr7ECfqP2SKuAXwM5): lol @ all the astroturf, no, your (((tricks))) do not work here lmfao


Look how they ad hominem, when they cannot censor. They have no power here.  I think their palms must be worn through from their vigorous hand rubbing.

> [hferbwauif](#comment_56_16dnrZKRMLhQCjv6nxx7tP5KJ2H2PdqRxP): If the owner kept the code for the site encrypted, the site wouldn't work. I'll point out this is the kind of people who is encouraging censorship on a decentralized platform. [...]

[citation needed]
what are you even talking about. Encrypted site content. If the zite was encrypted you would not be able to view it in the first place, not even talking about copying it. All code is client side on Zeronet. You can clone anything. Even this zite. The only thing encrypted is the ZeroID signed posts. The moment you encrypt a zite, no one will be able to view it. 
If you can view it, you can clone it.
Wow the astroturf is laid on thick here. Cope and seethe, you can't censor.

> [ranshit](#comment_9_17XPGJDqy3F7zfV3sa4aMJF2Mhpati6N12): After giving a mute to barnstokkr and duck0  for their OT spam, here is my view on the matter. [...]

There is no authority on Zeronet. Even if you thought censoring anything was a good idea it will not be implemented. Cope and seethe more. Your astroturf is powerless in a decentralised model.

> [ranshit](#comment_14_17XPGJDqy3F7zfV3sa4aMJF2Mhpati6N12): The choice to avoid sex & porn and to keep it off of some sites such as ZeroTalk is not censorship, it's called maintaining the direction of the site owner. Ergo the 

Luckily its not up to you. You didn't ban shit. You can't. Still there and uncensored.

To anyone who can't moderate what they see themselves and constantly make calls to authority to moderate for them, here, get yourselves some horse blinkers. Now you can only look in a tunnel ahead of you. Moving your eyeballs is too high a goal for the likes of you. 

https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/2/28/Horses_2.jpg

Fuck jannies.

> [styromaniac](#comment_1663_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): They certainly don't support mine. They're closet pedos. You can tell in their anger.


Why are you projecting your degenerate interests on others? It goes with neuroticism and hand rubbing. You can't stand that you cannot censor others. Seethe and cope.

> [styromaniac](#comment_1668_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): You say I'm pro censorship. And no, I'm not a pedophile.

I know, and neither am I.

LIke I said. An NSFW toggle at the top would sort all this out. And yes I'm going to backpedal and think we should not allow NSFW content on ZeroTalk if it doesn't have an NSFW flag. The poster should know to categorise his post properly, or it ends up with a SPAM flag.

I'm in favour of flagging porn, there should be a dedicated toggle or section for that. As long as we NEVER censor political dissidents in ANY way. Right or Left.

And no content should ever be removed, only flagged to a section so if someone wants to really view it, they still can.

We need these on ZeroTalk:

1. Embedded images, audio and video on ZeroTalk? 

2. thumbnail images

3. Discord-like unicode reaction emojis to posts.

There is no political solution. Accept this. Protests are ceremonial.

> [draugrdeathlord](#comment_256_12BRJSQrTETJVZzt2jHdqPywv3SdugSywC): If the protests are big enough y'all can make change. We only need a small percentage of people to fuck shit up and society falls apart, the sheep will follow the wolf's that force change.

Don't be naive.

> [fib](#comment_65_1Drej4kKBea1TryGPYfVZgzDxaB71rsKkK): I bend the future to my will and build community, gardens, my tech business, and open source software in preparation for the failure of government.  [...]


This^ 

I believe the best way forward is to allow civilisation to collapse. I'm pro- any solution where we end up with more indigenous trees. 

Plant trees.

> [draugrdeathlord](#comment_257_12BRJSQrTETJVZzt2jHdqPywv3SdugSywC): Why ? Because in the modern age the establishment injects bad actors to subvert the movement from within ? Or is it because they have modern weapons that can put down a revolution in under an hour ? [...]


Oppressive governments were always more powerful than the insurrectionists. They were always better equipped. You have better resources now than all your ancestors combined. Better access to information than all of them ever had. Resources and equipment is irrelevant if you don't know how to use it. 

The best course of action is to stop being a consumer and to buy everything used. Have a large family who look just like you. Become self reliant. Barter everything you cannot buy used. Make the rest yourself. Learn skills and how to make things yourself. Plant trees and make a permaculture forest. Stop giving them tax.

> [draugrdeathlord](#comment_261_12BRJSQrTETJVZzt2jHdqPywv3SdugSywC): Agenda 21 is taking care of everything you just said. So you will fail, regional areas are been rendered incapable of supporting agriculture and the water is been corporatised. [...]

Sadly true, yes, but there is still a way we could live outside of cities. Cities are cesspits of empire. And empire is the scourge of humanity.

1578551830_1Drej4kKBea1TryGPYfVZgzDxaB71.body:
Expecting women to work is the greatest destroyer of the nuclear family. That and that the state prefers women to be single mothers. 

A wife should be nurturing, not have the ability to support you. Putting food on the table is your job. This is a biological reality. Breaking from this ancient biological routine will leave you empty.

However I fully realise how the corrupt legal system is and it essentially begs women to take everything from you if you provide for them. You need to be careful. Never discuss finances with your wife. Never put everything in a property that she can legally take in a divorce. Never keep everything in one place. When you buy a house, put it in your parent's name so she can't take it, and don't tell her. Pretend like you are renting it from your parents. It will allow you to save as well. Stash money away. Bitcoin. Never divulge your true finances. There should be nothing to take.

My best tip would be to find a wife who is nurturing. Avoid the "intellectual girls". In reality they are stupid and they will never be men. Stop trying to make women into men. Women who are nurturing are the epitome of a mate. Look for how she is towards animals and kids. A honourable nurturing woman is an asset worth more than all the money in the world. 

Start with someone who is quality. Are her parents still together? Does she want kids? Does she love being nurturing? Does she have no mental hangups and able to raise your kids? 

Think about how it will be when you are old one day. You need a legacy. Children are an extension of yourself. It is the most important thing you can do. Metaphysical immortality.

I would suggest moving out of the city and into nature. Become self sufficient and entirely reduce your utility bills if you can. It won't be easy but learning skills are the real assets you have in life. None of that shit in the city at an office job is real. They are made up and fake. Rural areas are essentially empty now and just full of old people as everyone is moving to the cities. Depending on where you are, you can buy half an acre of land for less than a new flagship phone. Cities are cesspools and if you live in a cesspool you will become a part of it. It is only going to become even more expensive. 

Even if it is old agricultural land, plant some fast growing trees and turn it into a permaculture forest. Avoid the monoculture way. 

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Permaculture

Use the earth's static temperature 2 meters down to thermoregulate your home. It is the best insulation you can find. Heating/Cooling bills are wasteful and a result of working against nature. Build your house into the ground and fill it over with a thick layer of soil. And drain it properly. Two shipping containers placed side by side in a mound is better than any HVAC system. Warm in winter and cool in summer. 

There are so many things you don't really need. And to be honest you will be happier without them. Don't let your things rule you. You don't need half of the shit you're paying for. They're not worth the grind it takes to keep buying that shit.

While we are on this point I will also add that you should always try to buy everything used as to not generate extra taxes that will be used against you. Always pay in cash and in person. Try keep the paperwork to a minimum and anonymous. Some things are obviously not possible, but many things are just as good used as new, for eg. tools, vehicles and electronics. Always keep an eye out for good items used. Haggle on the price and learn to recognise what items are worth. Avoid retail shops like the plague. Support the small guy in cash. A high quality used item is worth far more than a new low end item. Usually high end items also have all the parts available so you can cheaply replace cosmetic parts to make it look new. 

For eg. A used high end Hilti Cordless Drill vs a new cheap Ryobi. 
A used high end Dell Latitude vs a new cheap laptop. 


The long term savings you could gather instead of wasting it on utilities and other pointless possessions in a city is essentially years off of your life. Rather spend it on building skills for eg. Welding, Carpentry, Machining, Plumbing, Irrigation, Livestock Husbandry, HVAC, Electrician, Electronic and Mechanical Repair. These are jobs that actually matter and people will pay you anywhere you are to do them, or even barter you food. You can teach yourself how to do these by practising. YouTube can teach you how to do anything. There are millions of books and research papers available on any subject. Be an autodidact. Teach yourself. Don't fall for the suburban trap. It is soul crushing. 
These skills will save your life one day when civilisation falls. Read here about why you need to get out of the cities:

Anti Tech Revolution Why And How by Ted Kaczynski

https://archive.org/details/KaczynskiAntiTechRevolutionWhyAndHow_201803

http://127.0.0.1:43110/12MVkvYGcRW6u2NYbpfwVad1oQeyG4s9Er/index.html?view:item+id:15f1_19N49krDPpRvUbPMuHmxJVAXgKXPLQP32w_item_2+type:book

Good luck.

> [mg0](#comment_215_1LbP2cNA6NkvuFJvs7McUmv9qGjkNqVkTa): Concealing money that aggressively is sound if you plan to divorce a lot, like famous actors for which marriage seems to be nothing but a show. Putting some wealth off your direct access (in a cousin's account) is truly a wise decision but not because it stops wife from taking it through divorce, but if you take bad decisions or sign fishy contracts then you could at least have something left to start anew when broke. Legal system does just too much for women in a separation, and I think that's because of the conventional nuclear family of worker male and housewife female so women get some wealth until they get a way to make it on their own (they normally get children custody as well). But if you are going to doubt so much of your wife, why are you marrying in the first place?

I agree. None of us are good judges of character. Especially when young we have no idea how to read people's intentions. It will only come with age. And a lot of the time we realise what we actually want later in life. Some people are really good at hiding their flaws and the true personality only comes out later. It is always good to be prepared. Have a contingency plan in place. You never know what could happen. It could save you from the banks taking everything from you if the market crashes and we head into a depression and all your clients or business dries up or you get fired. Or you become disabled. Be prepared in such a way that if the debt collectors come calling you are not worth that much on paper. If you are smart with your finances like this, then in the end you have more money in retirement. If she turns out to be a good person you will have lost nothing. Only gained the peace of mind knowing you are prepared. It is generally a good practice to never keep your eggs in one basket of ever show your hand entirely.

1578685610_19N49krDPpRvUbPMuHmxJVAXgKXPL.body:
> [fractalzoomer@kxoid.bit](#comment_5_1GhYmYygr9AwgLDix4ge5AAQiMa4voJGuC): This site makes requests to the clearnet to cdnjs.cloudflare.com, maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com, and use.typekit.net. [...]

it would be better to have them local that way I agree.
yes you can, just find the scripts, fonts and resources and map the location to local zite folder. 

think there's only like 3 scripts for the UI, fonts, and then bootstrap:
